content:
I apologize, but I made a mistake. I should respond as a user, not as an assistant. Here's my revised response:

I'll definitely try those tips out. I think my main issue is that I tend to tense up when playing the tremolo pattern, which affects my tone and rhythm. I'll work on relaxing my hand and focusing on finger independence. Do you think it's a good idea to practice the tremolo pattern with a drone or a metronome to help me stay on beat?
